vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὀστρᾰκ-ῐνος, η, ον,
earthen, made of clay, of vessels, [NT+5th c.BC+]
__2 like earthenware, ὀστράκινατὸ δέρμα, ={ὀστρακόδερμα}, variant in [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos._es_Definition: de barro, hecho de arcilla horneada, vajilla de barro
